meanings.definition: Having a greater height than average.
meanings.sent1: The giraffe is taller than the elephant.
meanings.sent2: She grew taller after a year.
meanings.sent3: The tree felt taller than the bushes around it.
meanings.sent4: His dreams reached taller heights every day.
meanings.sent5: The skyscraper stood taller than any other building in the city.

meanings.sent1: This ladder is taller than the one we used yesterday.

meanings.sent4: His tales grew taller with each retelling.
meanings.sent5: The waves grew taller as the storm approached.
